title: Please roll back old version! Patch 7.1 is total unplayable
body:
FPS dropped to lower than 20, even using lowest screen resolution and lowest display setting

my computer was use to play very smooth in old version

replies.body: Frame drops are a common issue that can happen from general wear and tear, outdated drivers, or bad game files.  Run through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure everything is in good health to get you in-game.  Double check your frame cap setting via the video options in-game to make sure it's not being limited.  I hope that helps!
